## Summary sheet ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Main use-cases MOI estimation, reconstruction of SNP haplotypes
Authors Nianqiao Ju, Jiawei Liu, Qixin He
Latest version 2024-04-30
License GPL-3.0
Website https://www.google.com
Code repository https://github.com/nianqiaoju/snp-slice
Publication https://academic.oup.com/bioinformatics/article/40/6/btae344/7695237#467922339
Tutorial authors TODO
Tutorial date TODO
````` ::: ::: ## Purpose The `SNP-slice` algorithm enables reconstruction of SNP haplotypes from bi-allelic data, allowing for inference of haplotype/strain frequencies. ## Existing resources The [`SNP-slice` GitHub repository](https://github.com/nianqiaoju/snp-slice) includes scripts for implementing the SNP-slice algorithm, as well as scripts for analyzing output and generating figures. ## Citation The publication associated with the `SNP-slice` algorithm and analysis scripts can be found [here (Ju et al 2024 Bioinformatics)](https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btae344).
